entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 5:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: WSW 35 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
